review: We live in a system of second opinions, where too many doctors suggest big scary procedures and leave you confused and worried about if you need them and why. All you hope for is a capable doctor you can trust who says it like it is and puts your care above other considerations and that's exactly how Dr Tekchandani was. Setting aside how easy and comfortable all the procedures I got done were, she's honest and upfront and puts you first and is what you hope all doctors  and dentists would be.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
context: Wisdom Tooth Extraction,RCT - Root Canal Treatment,
review: My first visit to the dentist after the pandemic, Dr Mahika was very warm. Not only is her clinic very chic and her consultation in the open (so I was very comfortable talking to her), but her counseling and identification of my wisdom tooth issue and root canal treatment amazing. The procedure was pain free and I am very comfortable now. She is now my dentist for the future.

**** **** *** ***** ******* The doctor is very patient - she gave me time to explain my issue post diagnosis and answered any and every question I had. Also, the line of treatment worked - the doctor was able to save my tooth whereas other (prior) consultations from other doctors just were just to extract the tooth - Dr Mahika was able to save it with a Root Canal - that too pain free. The clinic was a great experience, I'm surely coming back here from now onwards.

Hi I'm Advocate Kiran ,food used to get stuck in my teeth and to remove the carrot fibre ,chicken shreds used to be both irritating and embarrassing therefore I visited my friendly neighborhood Dental Clinic "Dentopolis".This was one of the most sensible things I did highly professional efficient Dr Mahika immediately understood my problem,my anxiety and relaxed me .She with her competent staff handled my problem so well that now I enjoy and relish my food

I went to Dentopolis and Dr Mahika personally attended to me. The pain in the tooth was unbelievable, and she immediately took care of the same. Had to do a root canal, which was done painlessly, and to perfection. She is very Humble and has a great hand. Highly recommend Dentopolis for any Dental treatment. Also the ambience of the clinic is very nice. Ample car parking also available.
Sanjay

tags: Treatment satisfaction,Explanation of the health issue,Doctor friendliness,
review: After ignoring my gum problem for months I finally decided to take an opinion for it. The doctor explained to me the cause, treatment and the after effects of ignoring the problem. After the treatment I was given proper systematic instructions to follow for the next 2 weeks and how I must take care of my gums and prevent the problem from happening again. The explanation was in a simple language, and I recommend the Doctor as she is very approachable.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
review: DENTOPOLIS, I visited last week due to a bad toothache. A very young smiley doctor and a good atmosphere coupled with proper precautions as required due to the pandemic, are worth a mention. Proper sanitiser at the entry, temperature and oxygen check, PPE set for both- doctor & assistant, etc gave a safe and secure feel. Good professional treatment with sincerity is why I would give 10 on 10 to DENTOPOLIS

Doctor has a very professional clinic. It is very open and gives a good feeling about it. She is also very calm and patient, explaining the complete procedure and protocols. And her root canal treatment was painless 
Now that I have recovered and can eat properly, a full 5 out of 5 for the doctor

tags: Doctor friendliness,Treatment satisfaction,Explanation of the health issue,Value for money,Wait time,
review: Very good clinic. The doctor is very professional and patient - explained the seriousness to me a also saved my tooth. The clinic was a good experience, unlike my old dentist. Thank you Dr Mahika

Dr.Mahika is Simple, down to Earth person. She Treats Patient's with Confidence nd Cycologicly. She give right Advice nd Consection to Senior citizens. She always believes there is Solutions to all Problems relating Teeth.Which gives Confidence to the Patient. Her Treatment is good with all Precaution measures.
